price: 44. Marka waad xusuusan doontaan waxaan idinku leeyahay, waxaana u tala saartay arrinkayga Alle. Hubaal Alle wuu Arkaa addoomahiisa.
arabic: فَسَتَذۡكُرُونَ مَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمۡۚ وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمۡرِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَصِيرُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fasatadhkurūna mā aqūlu lakum wa-ufawwiḍu amrī ilā al-lahi inna al-laha baṣīrun bil-ʿibādi
